infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app requires access to the photo library to choose images.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires access to the camera to take photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app requires access to the photo library to save images.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app requires access to location services to function properly.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app requires access to location services to function properly.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app requires access to location services to function properly.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
